title.rendered: Wyndham Rounds the Bases for Season Two with Minor League Baseball

content.rendered:
Celebrates with members by offering some of its richest Wyndham Rewards® redemptions yet

PARSIPPANY, N.J., March 26, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — Baseball is back, and nothing says fun like catching a hometown game with friends and family. For the second year in a row, Wyndham Hotels & Resorts and its award-winning loyalty program, Wyndham Rewards, are taking up the titles of Official Hotel Partner and Hotel Loyalty Partner of Minor League Baseball (MiLB)—unlocking for fans some of its richest ticket packages and experiences yet.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/wyndham-rounds-the-bases-for-season-two-with-minor-league-baseball-302098506.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
